text: Jona asa arundu mavɨŋgumbañɨ arɨkikwɨrɨ hɨvɨ kɨyɨmi. Sɨwɨmañanda Krundu Ñɨŋi hama ndahara arɨkikwɨrɨ hɨvɨ sava humbañɨ kɨyɨmandɨ. 12.40 Jona 1.17yɨ ŋgamara. Kru Gotɨndu kuyu mɨŋata ambavaravara Jonandu aŋgwɨmɨkɨyɨ Jona uta pɨhu aru Ninive hati krunavundiŋ Gotɨndu kuyu ambavarahi, nuŋandɨ kuyu indarɨta mavɨŋgimɨrumurɨm ambavarami. Jona 3.5yɨ ŋgamara.
